projects.title: K-Means Algorithm for Unsupervised Learning
projects.description: Enhancing image understanding through the extraction of meaningful patterns from data, improving visual comprehension.

projects.title: CNN for Hurricane Damage Classification
projects.description: Utilized Convolutional Neural Networks for classifying the existence of hurricane damage. This advanced model provides nuanced insights, aiding disaster response planning by allocating resources more precisely based on detected severity levels in the visual data.

projects.title: Panoramic Image Stitching
projects.description: Implemented homographies with Scikit libraries for panoramic image stitching, seamlessly blending visual elements. This technique enhances the creation of panoramic images, ensuring a cohesive and visually pleasing result by aligning and combining multiple images through geometric transformations.

projects.title: Real-Time Online Learning with PES Rule
projects.description: Executed in the Neural Engineering Framework, the project enables adaptive connection weight adjustments, demonstrating effective online learning. It dynamically masters the square function, aligning output closely with input after initial seconds. Rigorous testing includes systematic variations of hyperparameters, such as functions, learning rates, and training times.

projects.title: Tackling CartPole with OpenAI Gym
projects.description: Designed a resilient reinforcement learning model for CartPole-v1 in OpenAI Gym. Implemented a Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithm to train the agent in maintaining optimal balance on the cart-mounted pole.

projects.title: Pavlov's Dog Conditional Stimulus Simulation
projects.description: Utilized Nengo simulation, applying PBS learning rule for dynamic stimuli-response weight adjustments. Successfully replicated Pavlovian behavior, offering nuanced insights. Demonstrated "neurons that fire together wire together" principle, showcasing emergent neural connectivity patterns.

projects.title: Decision Making Model with Nengo Neural Simulator
projects.description: Utilized Nengo 3.2.0 to simulate a neuro accumulator, integrating input functions. Implemented synaptic connections for binary decisions, assessing diverse ensembles to capture biological relevance in decision-making.

projects.title: Django+TensorFL Hub:Object Detection
projects.description: Developed a robust Django web application and seamlessly integrated TensorFlow Hub's Inception ResNet V2 model, enhancing capabilities in image analysis and object detection.

projects.title: Wild Rydes
projects.description: SERVERLESS! Perform version control in the deployment code of static webpage, used AWS amplify to host the static webpage frontend and DynamoDB hold user data. Utilized tools: Codecommit, DynamoDB, Amplify, AWS CLI, AWS API gateway, Cognito

projects.title: Trend Micro One
projects.description: Security + DevOps. Used Trend Micro to add security checks and block targeted attacks on the site. It can visualise attacks in the cloud infrastructure.

projects.title: DEVMLOPS
projects.description: DevOps + Machine Learning

projects.title: Analyze progressive bias in the GPT-4 model: Nationstates-LLM
projects.description: Utilized the nationstates API to access data and make decisions in the game. Drafted a virtual nation constitution, enabling GPT-4 to read and select the most appropriate decision according to my constitution. Evaluation revealed minimal progressive bias, affirming GPT-4's alignment to constitutional values.

projects.title: GMM-Segmentation
projects.description: Implemented the Gaussian mixture model (GMM) for image segmentation, effectively distinguishing foreground and background. This segmentation facilitated the identification of prominent features, thereby enhancing overall image comprehension and visual understanding.

projects.title: Deep Q-Learning for Game AI
projects.description: Implemented a Deep Q-Network (DQN) to train an agent to play Atari games. The agent learns optimal strategies through trial and error, demonstrating the power of reinforcement learning in complex environments.

projects.title: Policy Gradient Methods
projects.description: Explored various policy gradient algorithms including REINFORCE and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) for continuous control tasks. These methods directly optimize the policy without needing a value function.

projects.title: Spiking Neural Networks
projects.description: Developed biologically plausible neural models using spiking neurons. These networks more accurately represent how the brain processes information through discrete spike events rather than continuous activation.

projects.title: Neural Engineering Framework
projects.description: Applied the Neural Engineering Framework (NEF) to build large-scale brain models. This approach allows for the systematic construction of neural networks that implement specific mathematical functions.

projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Designed and implemented a scalable microservices architecture using Docker and Kubernetes. This approach enables independent deployment and scaling of application components.

projects.title: Event-Driven System
projects.description: Built an event-driven system using Apache Kafka for real-time data processing. This architecture allows for loose coupling between services and improved scalability.

projects.title: Serverless Application
projects.description: Developed a fully serverless application using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB. This approach eliminates the need for server management and provides automatic scaling.

projects.title: Infrastructure as Code
projects.description: Implemented infrastructure as code using AWS CloudFormation and Terraform. This approach enables version-controlled, reproducible infrastructure deployments.
